string-array.name: insults
string-array.item: You give other morons a bad reputation.
Did you ride the short bus to school?
Maybe you should try playing when you\'re not drunk.
If you were any dumber, you\'d be elected to Congress.
Does a grown-up know you\'re using their phone?
Don\'t be embarrassed; lots of people didn\'t finish the 2nd grade.
I\'d suggest something more on your level, like finger painting or staring blankly into space.
Kids, this is why you shouldn\'t do drugs.
